list-item.p: Appreciate the epidemiology of acute pulmonary infections that require pediatric intensive care.
Review the signs and symptoms of bronchiolitis and pneumonia.
Review host defense mechanisms during acute pulmonary infections.
Review the common etiologies of bronchiolitis.
Review the common etiologies of pneumonia.
Understand the pathophysiology of bronchiolitis and pneumonia in children.
Understand the treatment options, including modes of ventilation, for bronchiolitis and pneumonia.
Understand an effective management strategy for parapneumonic effusions and empyemas.
